channel.title: Sound mod help
channel.description: Hello recently I have been trying to put the rebel sound's from hl2 into hl1, now I know what your thinking but just let me say, I am using these sound's for my own personal use. Anyway I convert the sound's in audacity to 11025hz and they work in half-life but the characters mouths will not move. How do I fix this problem? Can anyone help me with this problem? Please and thank you. :slight_smile:

item.title: Sound mod help
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
Good to see it’s fixed.
I, personally use Sony Sound Forge Audio Studio 9.0, and it’s fairly good for it’s pricetag, if a bit old now. Even comes with a CD of 1000 sound FX, though I’ve yet to use one.

Read full topic

item.title: Sound mod help
item.dc:creator: coldroll
item.description:
Never mind it works now thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Sound mod help
item.dc:creator: bur
item.description:
You can set it 8 bit in Audacity, in the File Formats tab in Preferences.

Read full topic

item.description:
I still can’t do it and I did what you said. EDIT: also what do you use Jeffmod

item.title: Sound mod help
item.dc:creator: Nintyuk
item.description:
Well audacity is the best free one. Try looking for a add-on for audacity or investigate if the SDK contains a converter.

item.title: Sound mod help
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
Get a new sound editor.
I have commercial software, so I don’t know what free stuff you could get.

item.title: Sound mod help
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
They must be 8-bit mono sounds as well. That should work for you.

Read full topic

item.title: Sound mod help
item.dc:creator: coldroll
item.description:
Hello recently I have been trying to put the rebel sound’s from hl2 into hl1, now I know what your thinking but just let me say, I am using these sound’s for my own personal use. Anyway I convert the sound’s in audacity to 11025hz and they work in half-life but the characters mouths will not move. How do I fix this problem? Can anyone help me with this problem? Please and thank you.

Read full topic
